name: places/ChIJT7nB3VNYwokRtEb1s7u_dwY
formattedAddress: 372 W 46th St A, New York, NY 10036, USA
adrFormatAddress: 372 W 46th St A, New York, NY 10036-8310, USA

originalText.text: This company only cares about collecting your rent. If you have an issue, they ignore your calls, gaslight you, or accuse you of lying.  I went weeks with no heat and months without a secure mailbox. Not only are they unresponsive, Mr. Davis is an incredibly rude human - do not rent from this horrible company. RUN, don't walk.

I went weeks with no heat and months without a secure mailbox. Not only are they unresponsive, Mr. Davis is an incredibly rude human - do not rent from this horrible company. RUN, don't walk.

originalText.text: Renting from Davis Realty was a nightmare. I've worked with some pretty incompetent companies, but this one was by far the worst. If you make the mistake to rent from them, be prepared to have your packages stolen, calls ignored, repairs left unmended, and time wasted. They can't do something as simple as pick up a phone. When it comes to problem solving, they're like children, having to hand things off to their boss as soon as the conversation steers towards even a hint of conflict. That would be fine if their boss was capable of doing anything, but Milton (you know, the owner of the property) claims he has no responsibility over the buildings common areas and no control over the maintenence. They do this funny thing where they say they need to get into the basement to solve every problem, which according to them they need the maintenance people for. Don't ask me how the owner of the building doesn't have a key to the basement. If anything happens to a package (which it will, multiple times) be prepared to get police involved as the folks at Davis Realty refuse to check their camera, which according to them doesn't work, even though the light is constantly on. When I was renting from Davis Realty, maintenence became a really unfunny ongoing joke. Fun fact, Davis Realty actually employs the Loch Ness monster for repairs. The man does not exist. You can call twenty times, don't expect anything to get fixed. I'm convinced they pulled a Weekend at Bernie's and found some poor stiff that looked vaguely like a repairman, waved him around for a week around when I was touring, then gave up the act. All jokes aside, Davis Realty is a miserable business and renting from them was awful. Don't do it. Find yourself a better apartment with better owners.

originalText.text: Do not rent with them! Worst company ever, they will take a long time to fix anything at your apartment and they will just walk in your apartment without authorization. Complete invasion of privacy. Also they don’t take care of the trash  as they should. Piles of trash mounted and no space to throw away your trash.

originalText.text: Worst Landlord possible. Took forever to respond to maintenance issues. Emailing them takes so long for them to reply and they are very unprofessional. The building was not in a good condition. (No exhaust van and when you cook, the grease went everywhere). The front door doesn't lock properly.

originalText.text: Smallest apartment ever for not a very good deal, poorly maintained facilities, poorly maintained common areas, basically all that’s worst about NYC landlords.
